## Atenção: novo [Template do projeto](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1hyTFOePA_I503SdOsruNnPWD3bKxq-4NTfp1YzsrZ4Y/edit?usp=sharing) e [Guia do Revisor em Português](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1C-s6gAMvFBvYpDJi5zVDN3hsO3p0t5oKN8hcP3jE_Us/edit?usp=sharing)

Submission Type:  PDF
Review Time Estimate: 20 minutes
Description: Create a Facebook advertising campaign

[DMND Reviewers Handbook](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gILVtaotovaqd1hc8b7fBwnBQNdKJlbq-agyvbOicI8/edit?usp=sharing)

See [P3: Reviewer Guide](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1g-Tt7vM-B8l7eGoUrbaBiRQv5Pp9mRPgS__pQ5PRqxc/edit?usp=sharing) for a step by step outline of what to look for.
---- 
**Project Description/Requirements**: (this is what students see)

## 
With your target persona in mind, you will create a Facebook advertising campaign, using what you learned in the social advertising course. You will execute your campaign on the Facebook platform. 

----
# Projeto 3: Faça uma campanha no Facebook (Parte 1)

Make a copy of this [Google doc template](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1hyTFOePA_I503SdOsruNnPWD3bKxq-4NTfp1YzsrZ4Y/edit?usp=sharing) and complete each section. When you are ready, save your file as a PDF and submit it here.

## Part 1: Build your Campaign
1. Describe your approach in 250 words or less. (Please include which project challenge you are working on DMND or Blitz.)
2. Copy and paste your “Target Customer Persona” from Project 1: Prepare to Market, in the space provided below. This will be your guide for building your campaign. 
3. Project checklist:

   <type="checkbox">  <input type="checkbox"> Your campaign name is your student Id 

   <type="checkbox">  <input type="checkbox"> Does your Ad Set Name description of your target customer persona?

   <type="checkbox">  <input type="checkbox"> Review your targeting - does it make sense given your target customer persona?

   <type="checkbox">  <input type="checkbox"> Have you selected a minimum of three images for your campaign? Or the video?

   <type="checkbox">  <input type="checkbox"> Confirm your Lifetime budget is $100.00

   <type="checkbox">  <input type="checkbox"> Is your campaign scheduled to “Start” set a minimum of one week out from today's date. Set the “End” date for your campaign to three to five days after the start date.

Paste the screenshot of your Ad Summary in the space provided below.  (To ensure reviewers are able to you evaluate your campaign you’ll want to separate the Order Review into two screenshots.)

----

1. **Description of your approach**:

2. **Target Customer Persona**:

3. **Ad Summary**:

### Rubric
You can reference this project's [rubric](https://review.udacity.com/#!/rubrics/859/view) to review what your submission should include.
